title: New: Anna River – My Only Source For Love
content:
This new track from New York based film student and singer/songwriter Anna River is truly heart-breaking.

There’s a hint of Feist in her delicate yet measured vocals, which are layered to fantastic effect throughout My Only Source For Love. Where some would settle for a simple acoustic number, Anna River has clearly crafted this track to her own specifications, demonstrated through the addition of a percussion section midway through. Anna weeps ‘You’re my only source for love, you’re the only reason why I’m crying’ in a tone so utterly devastating that it’s impossible to not be moved.

Check out My Only Source For Love below, and head over to Anna’s blog for some insightful ramblings and a scrapbook-esque collection of photos.
